column4: -- I'm trying to play runescape. I have sound generally, but not when I play this game
does it require direct OSS access? If you're using esd, have you tried esddsp $game ?
the game required the java runtime pluggin for the firefox browser
do you have time now to help me?
it means wait a sec, because I have to take care of my pets
runescape required the java runtime plugin in firefox
ok, I'm not sure how that's affected by OSS...
OK, esd is running, any other ideas?
I mentioned about 20 minutes ago that you could try: esddsp $game
the game is on the internet, how do I do that?
ok, then you'll have to temporarily suspend esd. Try unchecking the System> Preferences> Sound> Enable sound server startup
then try your Java applet again
